abstract: John D. Durrett, a private equity executive, is the Treasury Department’s fourth director nominee for Ally Financial and comes as the lender prepares for an initial public offering.
snippet: John D. Durrett, a private equity executive, is the Treasury Department’s fourth director nominee for Ally Financial and comes as the lender prepares for an initial public offering.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department said on Monday that it had named John D. Durrett as a director for Ally Financial, the former lending arm of General Motors, which received a taxpayer-financed bailout during the financial crisis.

headline.main: Treasury Names Buyout Executive to Ally Board

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
